item.title: Testing terraform with Pester
item.description: In this post I’d like show how you can create integrations tests for terraform with Pester, a powershell testing framework.

item.title: PowerShell Core as default shell on a Debian devcontainer
item.description: Here we’ll cover setting up powershell on a dev container with a debian:buster baseimage.
